name: LD34-Metamorphosis
description:
A simple game for the Ludum Dare 34.

Attempt to survive life as a tadpole, your goal is to grow into a frog so that you can reproduce and further your species.

Controls :

A / D to move

Link to Ludum Dare page :

http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-34/?action=p...
